roleset.name: Beat or attack with force
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class hit-18.1-1. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Hit a person
example.text: I lifted high the shovel and whanged it down on Harvey's head.

example.name: Propel due to force
example.text: I remember the way the wind whanged it around.

example.name: attack forcefully
example.text: Yet, they still whang away at the school reform plan.
